definition: Romance of the Three Kingdoms by Luo Guanzhong 羅貫中|罗贯中[Luo2 Guan4 zhong1], one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/a fictional account of the Three Kingdoms at the break-up of the Han around 200 AD, consistently portraying Liu Bei's Shu Han 劉備|刘备, 蜀漢|蜀汉 as virtuous heroes and Cao Cao's Wei 曹操, 魏 as tyrannical villains
surname San
three/3
country/nation/state/national/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Guo
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
justice/righteousness/meaning/foster (father etc)/adopted/artificial (tooth, limb etc)/relationship/friendship
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: " The romance of the Three Kingdoms " in figure on each side of its state, long or short.
sentences.chinese: 《三國演義》中的人物各具其態，有長有短。

sentences.english: My favorite book is the romance of The Three Kingdoms by luo guanzhong in Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜愛的書是明代羅貫中所著《三國演義》了。

sentences.english: Historical Pinghua has much bearing on the novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 講史平話與《三國演義》成書的關係十分密切。

sentences.english: Some teachers even ask little children to read Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 有的老師甚至叫小孩子去讀《三國演義》。

sentences.english: The game was designed with the novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms in mind.
sentences.chinese: 這款遊戲的設計理念源自小說《三國演義》。

sentences.english: The lengthy historical novel" the Romance of the Three Kingdoms" inside, displays obviously censures Cao.
sentences.chinese: 長篇歷史小說《三國演義》裏面，表現出明顯的貶曹。

sentences.english: Tentative analysis of ambitious scoundrel Caocao figure in Romance of the Three kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 試析三國演義裏曹操的奸雄形象。

sentences.english: That day you were reading the Chinese classics "Romance of the 3 kingdom".
sentences.chinese: 那一天你在讀中國古典名著三國演義。

definition: Water Margin or Outlaws of the Marsh by Shi Nai'an 施耐庵[Shi1 Nai4 an1], one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature
historical drama

historical person

A New Account of the Tales of the World, collection of anecdotes, conversations, remarks etc of historic personalities, compiled and edited by Liu Yiqing 劉義慶|刘义庆[Liu2 Yi4 qing4]
edge of the water/shore or sea, lake or river/seashore
Three Kingdoms period (220-280) in Chinese history/several Three Kingdoms periods in Korean history, esp. from 1st century AD to unification under Silla 新羅|新罗[Xin1 luo2] in 658
folk art consisting of storytelling to music
Journey to the West, Ming dynasty novel by Wu Cheng'en 吳承恩|吴承恩, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/also called Pilgrimage to the West or Monkey
Sima Qian (145-86 BC), Han Dynasty historian, author of Records of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], known as the father of Chinese historiography
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty

Zhuge Liang (181-234), military leader and prime minister of Shu Han 蜀漢|蜀汉 during the Three Kingdoms period/the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius/mastermind
lit. to quote the classics/to quote chapter and verse (idiom)

Three Hundred Tang Poems, an anthology collected around 1763 by Sun Zhu 孫誅
